artist: Artist: Donald King; Publisher: Donald King , Coquitlam, Canada
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, photomechanical illustration of a figure reading a script, with letterpress and card-suit designs, printed in color and black-and-white offset lithography on coated paper covers; 96 pp.
inscription: Title page, black ink pen: Donald King 2001 276/500
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: The Wandering Eye
